full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer

## Request Details

We are seeking suppliers to provide labour, equipment, materials, tools, transportation, estimating, and supervision services for HVAC and mechanical projects, alterations, maintenance, diagnostic inspections, repairs, and replacement of HVAC and mechanical systems located in the Edmonton area. This effort is on an "as and when" required basis.

## Contract Details

- **Contract Title**: W684E-24LP88
- **Contract Reference No.**: WS4438300254-WP9440848692
- **Publication Date**: February 28, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 9, 2024 @ 2:00 PM
- **Contract Period**: June 1, 2024 to May 31, 2027
- **Contract Value**: to be determined based on the lowest price selection criterion
- **Trade Agreement**: This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Project Location**: Edmonton, Alberta, Canada
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive, open bidding

## Contracting Party

- **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Agency Address**: 11 Laurier St, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
- **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
- **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

## Contact Information

- **Name**: Tikhonovitch, Alex
- **Email**: alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (no phone number provided)

## Tender Documents and Notice

The tender notice is publicly available on the Ariba Discovery website at:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18922360?extsite=MTg5MjIzNjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
